thread.title: Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons
thread.title_full: Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons

title: Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons
text:
> Top News Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons Chicago Bulls forward Taj Gibson, left, points after scoring a basket as Detroit Pistons center Andre Drummond looks to the bench during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
